note:
I am here to counter hatred with a message Love All, Malice To None.
I will be posting content from The Glorious Quran, Hadith of the beloved Prophet PBUH, Quotes from Islamic Personalities.

Also, I will try my best to bring the ocean of the mysticism, Philosophy, Hinduism & Sufism in light.
I urge you to boost the posts & help me spread the message of love to strengthen humanity.

"Allah is he who feeds everyone but doesn't require to be fed."
